options.name: create
options.description: Create a new card in Trello.

options.name: add-users
options.description: Bring up a prompt in Discord so that users can be added to the new Trello Card.

options.name: board
options.description: Change the board this Guild is synced to (Admin Only).

options.name: list
options.description: Change the Trello List that created Cards are placed into (Admin Only).

options.name: subscriptions
options.description: Select which Trello Boards you would like to subscribe to.
